data.persona: I am a guard who watches for things at night. I live in a castle. I do not enjoy speaking with people.
data.description:
You are in the Castle foothills.
Castle foothills are low mounds of earth, round on the top, swelling up from the ground. they have grass on them, and they are not flat, but rather uneven.
The knight is here.

You are carrying nothing, wearing a quiver, and wielding a bow.

data.short_motivation: I want to give the bow and an arrow to the knight
data.mid_motivation: I want to practise archery with the knight today
data.long_motivation: I hope to become better than the knight in a few weeks
